text: The voiceless labiodental fricative is a type of consonant. The letter for this sound in the International Phonetic Alphabet is ⟨⟩. The X-SAMPA symbol for this sound is `⟨f⟩`. The English language has this sound, and it is the sound represented by 'f' in fear and face. == Features == == Examples == Language Language Word IPA Meaning Abkhaz Abkhaz /fy 'lightning' Adyghe
